sentence.Network_en: He comes from a completely uncultured, lower middle-class family.
sentence.Network_cn: 他来自中下阶层一个根本没什么文化的家庭。

sentence.Network_en: Party activists with lower middle class pedigrees are numerous.
sentence.Network_cn: 党的激进分子中有很多出身于中产阶级下层.

sentence.Network_en: He belongs to the lower middle class.

list.abs: and the lower-middle class who are interested the economic , practical , functional , reasonable , community facilities .而中低收入阶层他们关心的则是经济、实用、功能合理、社区配套。

the lower middle class , the small manufacturer , the shopkeeper , the artisan , the peasant , all these fight against the bourgeoisie , to save from extinction their existence as fractions of the middle class .中间等级，即小工业家、小商人、手工业者、农民，他们同资产阶级作斗争，都是为了维护他们这种
it is rather the absence in English of works appealing to courtly tastes that makes the English language at this time as the language of the middle and lower classes .而是因为英语作品没能吸引宫廷的品位而使英语成为中下层阶级的语言。
...ass and laboring class）； 中下阶级（lower middle class ）；中产阶级（middle class）；中上阶级（upper middle class）和上层 …
he belongs to lower middle class .他来自中产阶级下层。

means.word_mean: 1. occupying the lower part of the middle socioeconomic range in a society
